page.title: 10HEALTH IN COOKLEY
page.content: Most people in the village are healthy which is a good job because there is just one surgery.There are two doctors and a nurse in attendance or on call. As the village population increasingly consists of elderly and retired people, the younger generation having moved out in search of housing and or jobs, the demands made upon the medical services also increase. Any dental problems have to be referred to practicioners in Kidderminster. The school dentist's mobile surgery does visit the school regularly and it treats many of the children.
